archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.4.4e: e) actions required to help minimise information risk (e.g. reviewing the organisation's risk appetite, understanding the threat landscape and encouraging business owners to remedy unacceptable risks)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
